newsitem.title: USA: GMG/Seneca and Phoenix Duff may partner.
newsitem.headline: GMG/Seneca and Phoenix Duff may partner.

text.p: GMG/Seneca Capital Management LLC and Phoenix Duff & Phelps Corp said Thursday they signed a non-binding letter of intent to enter into a strategic partnership.

Under the terms of the proposed transaction, Phoenix Duff & Phelps will acquire a majority ownership stake in the firm, with existing GMG/Seneca senior management retaining a significant equity position.
The cash deal values all of GMG/Seneca at $54 million, the companies said.
GMG/Seneca is a privately-owned San Francisco investment advisor with assets under management in excess of $3 billion.
No assurances can be given as to the completion, timing or final terms and conditions of the proposed transaction, the companies said.
